Metadata.Title: CVE-2021-38190 affecting package librsvg2 for versions less than 2.58.1-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2021-38190 affecting package librsvg2 for versions less than 2.58.1-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package librsvg2 is earlier than 2.58.1-1, affected by CVE-2021-38190
